text: Belton O'Neal Compton Jr. (February 5, 1951 - February 18, 2019) was an American actor and businessman. He was born in Sumter, South Carolina.O'Neal Compton Biography (1951-) He studied at Clemson University. He became popular in the 1990s for his roles in Deep Impact, Roadracers and in Kill Me Later, and Life . Compton died at a hospital in Columbia, South Carolina on February 18, 2019 at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Businesspeople from South Carolina Category:Actors from South Carolina
title: O'Neal Compton
